name: Biting-Palm Ninja

rulings.text: If you choose to remove a menace counter from Biting-Palm Ninja as its triggered ability resolves, a second triggered ability will go on the stack, and players may respond to it with spells and abilities. When that second ability resolves, the player will reveal their hand.
The ninjutsu ability can be activated only after blockers have been declared. Before then, attacking creatures are neither blocked nor unblocked.

As you activate a ninjutsu ability, you reveal the Ninja card in your hand and return the attacking creature. The Ninja card stays revealed and isn't put onto the battlefield until the ability resolves. If it leaves your hand before then, it won't enter the battlefield at all.

The creature with ninjutsu enters the battlefield attacking the same player or planeswalker that the returned creature was attacking. This is a rule specific to ninjutsu; in other cases, when a creature is put onto the battlefield attacking, that creature's controller chooses which player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Although the Ninja is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

The ninjutsu ability can be activated during the declare blockers step, combat damage step, or end of combat step. In most cases (see below), if you wait until the combatdamage step or end of combat step, it will be after combat damage has been dealt, so the Ninja won't deal combat damage.

If a creature in combat has first strike or double strike, you can activate the ninjutsu ability during the first-strike combat damage step. The Ninja will deal combat damage during the regular combat damage step, even if it has first strike.
Puff of smoke not included.

name: Blade of the Oni
text:
Menace
Equipped creature has base power and toughness 5/5, has menace, and is a black Demon in addition to its other colors and types.
Reconfigure {2}{B}{B} ({2}{B}{B}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

rulings.text: Blade of the Oni will overwrite any previous effects that set the equipped creature's power and toughness to specific numbers. Effects that otherwise modify the equipped creature's power and toughness will still apply no matter when they took effect. The same is true for +1/+1 counters.

Reconfigure represents two activated abilities. Reconfigure [cost] means “[Cost]: Attach this permanent to another target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery,” and “[Cost]: Unattach this permanent. Activate only if this permanent is attached to a creature and only as a sorcery.”
Attaching an Equipment with reconfigure to a creature causes that Equipment to stop being a creature until it becomes unattached. It also loses any creature subtypes it had.

An Equipment doesn't become tapped when the permanent it's attached to becomes tapped. For example, if you attack with a creature that is equipped with Acquisition Octopus, then use reconfigure to unattach Acquisition Octopus after combat, the Octopus will be untapped and could be used to block during your opponent's turn.

Similarly, if an Equipment is tapped, its reconfigure abilities may still be activated and it may still become attached to creatures. Becoming attached doesn't untap it. In most cases, an attached Equipment being tapped won't affect gameplay, but it will be relevant if it becomes unattached again before it untaps.
If an Equipment with reconfigure somehow loses its abilities while it is attached, the effect causing it to not be a creature continues to apply until it becomes unattached.

As soon as an Equipment creature with reconfigure stops being a creature, any Equipment and Auras with enchant creature abilities become unattached. Auras that can enchant an Equipment that isn't a creature remain attached to it.
An Equipment creature with reconfigure can be attached to creatures by effects other than its reconfigure ability, such as the activated ability of Brass Squire.
Although it causes an Equipment to become attached to a creature, reconfigure is not an “equip ability” for the purpose of cards like Fighter Class and Leonin Shikari.
An Equipment creature can never become attached to itself. If an effect tries to do this, nothing happens.

If a permanent with reconfigure is somehow still a creature after it becomes attached (perhaps due to an effect like that of March of the Machines), it immediately becomes unattached from the equipped creature.

name: Dokuchi Shadow-Walker
text: Ninjutsu {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
flavor: Don't fear the blade, fear the shadows.

rulings.text: The ninjutsu ability can be activated only after blockers have been declared. Before then, attacking creatures are neither blocked nor unblocked.

As you activate a ninjutsu ability, you reveal the Ninja card in your hand and return the attacking creature. The Ninja card stays revealed and isn't put onto the battlefield until the ability resolves. If it leaves your hand before then, it won't enter the battlefield at all.

The creature with ninjutsu enters the battlefield attacking the same player or planeswalker that the returned creature was attacking. This is a rule specific to ninjutsu; in other cases, when a creature is put onto the battlefield attacking, that creature's controller chooses which player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Although the Ninja is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

The ninjutsu ability can be activated during the declare blockers step, combat damage step, or end of combat step. In most cases (see below), if you wait until the combatdamage step or end of combat step, it will be after combat damage has been dealt, so the Ninja won't deal combat damage.

If a creature in combat has first strike or double strike, you can activate the ninjutsu ability during the first-strike combat damage step. The Ninja will deal combat damage during the regular combat damage step, even if it has first strike.
Puff of smoke not included.

rulings.text: You don't choose the target for Dokuchi Silencer's last ability until after you have chosen whether or not to discard a card. As you activate a ninjutsu ability, you reveal the Ninja card in your hand and return the attacking creature. The Ninja card stays revealed and isn't put onto the battlefield until the ability resolves. If it leaves your hand before then, it won't enter the battlefield at all.

The creature with ninjutsu enters the battlefield attacking the same player or planeswalker that the returned creature was attacking. This is a rule specific to ninjutsu; in other cases, when a creature is put onto the battlefield attacking, that creature's controller chooses which player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Although the Ninja is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

The ninjutsu ability can be activated during the declare blockers step, combat damage step, or end of combat step. In most cases (see below), if you wait until the combatdamage step or end of combat step, it will be after combat damage has been dealt, so the Ninja won't deal combat damage.

If a creature in combat has first strike or double strike, you can activate the ninjutsu ability during the first-strike combat damage step. The Ninja will deal combat damage during the regular combat damage step, even if it has first strike.

name: Invoke Despair
text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If they can't, they lose 2 life and you draw a card. Then repeat this process for an enchantment and a planeswalker.
flavor: Although officials said it was a sewer failure, the people whispered that it was a warning of night's reach.

rulings.text: The target opponent doesn't choose whether to sacrifice a creature or not, although they do choose which creature they control to sacrifice.
When you repeat the process, you don't choose a new player. The same player sacrifices each of the three permanents, if able.
You repeat the process for an enchantment and a planeswalker whether the target opponent was able to sacrifice a creature or not.

foreignNames.name: Invocar a la desesperación
foreignNames.text: El oponente objetivo sacrifica una criatura. Si no puede, pierde 2 vidas y tú robas una carta. Luego, repite este proceso con un encantamiento y con un planeswalker.
foreignNames.flavor: Aunque las fuentes oficiales afirmaron que fue un problema en el alcantarillado, los ciudadanos susurraban que era un aviso del alcance nocturno.

foreignNames.name: Invocation du désespoir
foreignNames.text: Un adversaire ciblé sacrifie une créature. S'il ne peut pas le faire, il perd 2 points de vie et vous piochez une carte. Puis répétez ce processus pour un enchantement et un planeswalker.
foreignNames.flavor: Les autorités annoncèrent que c'était un problème d'égout, mais la population murmurait qu'il s'agissait d'un avertissement des Confins de la nuit.

foreignNames.name: Invocare la Disperazione
foreignNames.text: Un avversario bersaglio sacrifica una creatura. Se non può, perde 2 punti vita e tu peschi una carta. Poi ripeti questo procedimento per un incantesimo e un planeswalker.
foreignNames.flavor: Nonostante la notizia ufficiale incolpasse un problema delle fognature, tra la gente si vociferava che fosse un avvertimento dei confini della notte.

foreignNames.name: 絶望招来
foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。そうできないなら、そのプレイヤーは２点のライフを失い、あなたはカード１枚を引く。その後、エンチャントとプレインズウォーカーについてもこの手順を繰り返す。
foreignNames.flavor: 公式発表では下水の問題であるとしているが、人々の間では夜陰の警告だと囁かれている。

foreignNames.name: 절망의 기원
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 생물 한 개를 희생한다. 그렇게 할 수 없다면, 그 플레이어는 생명 2점을 잃고 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑는다. 그 후 부여마법 및 플레인즈워커에 대해서 이 과정을 반복한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 관계자들은 하수도의 오류라고 말했지만, 사람들은 그것이 밤그림자가 다가오는 경고라고 속삭였다.

foreignNames.name: Invocar o Desespero
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo sacrifica uma criatura. Se ele não puder fazer isso, ele perde 2 pontos de vida e você compra um card. Depois, repita este processo para um encantamento e um planeswalker.
foreignNames.flavor: Embora as autoridades afirmassem que era um problema no esgoto, entre o povo corria o boato de que era um aviso do alcance da noite.

foreignNames.name: Призвать Отчаяние
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент жертвует существо. Если он не может этого сделать, то теряет 2 жизни, а вы берете карту. Затем повторите этот процесс для чар и planeswalker'а.
foreignNames.flavor: Хотя чиновники заявили, что прорвало канализацию, люди шептались, что это было предупреждение о могущественной хватке ночи.

foreignNames.name: 召现绝望
foreignNames.text: 目标对手牺牲一个生物。如果他无法如此作，则他失去2点生命且你抓一张牌。然后他为一个结界和一个鹏洛客各重复此流程。
foreignNames.flavor: 虽然正式公告只说这是下水道不畅，但人们纷纷传言这是夜幕明神的警告。

foreignNames.name: 召現絕望
foreignNames.text: 目標對手犧牲一個生物。如果他無法如此作，則他失去2點生命且你抽一張牌。然後他為一個結界和一個鵬洛客各重複此流程。
foreignNames.flavor: 雖然正式公告只說這是下水道不暢，但人們紛紛傳言這是夜幕明神的警告。

originalText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If they can't, they lose 2 life and you draw a card. Then repeat this process for an enchantment and a planeswalker.

name: Junji, the Midnight Sky
text:
Flying, menace
When Junji, the Midnight Sky dies, choose one —
• Each opponent discards two cards and loses 2 life.
• Put target non-Dragon creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose 2 life.

foreignNames.name: Junji der Nachthimmel
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend, Bedrohlich
Wenn Junji der Nachthimmel stirbt, bestimme eines —
• Jeder Gegner wirft zwei Karten ab und verliert 2 Lebenspunkte.
• Bringe eine Nicht-Drache-Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel. Du verlierst 2 Lebenspunkte.

foreignNames.name: Junji, el Cielo de Medianoche
foreignNames.text:
Vuela, amenaza.
Cuando Junji, el Cielo de Medianoche muera, elige uno:
• Cada oponente descarta dos cartas y pierde 2 vidas.
• Pon en el campo de batalla bajo tu control la carta de criatura objetivo que no sea Dragón de un cementerio. Pierdes 2 vidas.

foreignNames.name: Junji, le ciel de minuit
foreignNames.text:
Vol, menace
Quand Junji, le ciel de minuit meurt, choisissez l'un —
• Chaque adversaire se défausse de deux cartes et perd 2 points de vie.
• Mettez sur le champ de bataille, sous votre contrôle, une carte de créature non-Dragon ciblée depuis un cimetière. Vous perdez 2 points de vie.

foreignNames.name: Junji, il Cielo di Mezzanotte
foreignNames.text:
Volare, minacciare
Quando Junji, il Cielo di Mezzanotte muore, scegli uno —
• Ogni avversario scarta due carte e perde 2 punti vita.
• Metti sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo una carta creatura non Drago bersaglio da un cimitero. Perdi 2 punti vita.

foreignNames.name: 真夜中の空、殉至
foreignNames.text:
飛行、威迫
真夜中の空、殉至が死亡したとき、以下から１つを選ぶ。
・各対戦相手はそれぞれカード２枚を捨て、２点のライフを失う。
・墓地にありドラゴンでないクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それをあなたのコントロール下で戦場に出す。あなたは２点のライフを失う。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ドラゴン・スピリット

foreignNames.name: 자정의 하늘, 준지
foreignNames.text:
비행, 호전적
자정의 하늘, 준지가 죽을 때, 하나를 선택한다 —
• 각 상대는 카드 두 장을 버리고 생명 2점을 잃는다.
• 무덤에 있는 용이 아닌 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 조종하에 전장에 놓는다. 당신은 생명 2점을 잃는다.

foreignNames.name: Junji, o Céu da Meia-noite
foreignNames.text:
Voar, ameaçar
Quando Junji, o Céu da Meia-noite, morrer, escolha um —
• Cada oponente descarta dois cards e perde 2 pontos de vida.
• Coloque o card de criatura não Dragão alvo de um cemitério no campo de batalha sob seu controle. Você perde 2 pontos de vida.

foreignNames.name: Дзюндзи, Полуночное Небо
foreignNames.text:
Полет, Угроза
Когда Дзюндзи, Полуночное Небо умирает, выберите одно —
• Каждый оппонент сбрасывает две карты и теряет 2 жизни.
• Положите целевую карту не являющегося Драконом существа из кладбища на поле битвы под вашим контролем. Вы теряете 2 жизни.

foreignNames.name: 夜穹殉至
foreignNames.text:
飞行，威慑
当夜穹殉至死去时，选择一项～
•每位对手各弃两张牌且失去2点生命。
•将目标非龙生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。你失去2点生命。

foreignNames.name: 夜穹殉至
foreignNames.text:
飛行，威懾
當夜穹殉至死去時，選擇一項～
•每位對手各棄兩張牌且失去2點生命。
•將目標非龍生物牌在你的操控下從墳墓場放進戰場。你失去2點生命。

originalText:
Flying, menace
When Junji, the Midnight Sky dies, choose one —
• Each opponent discards two cards and loses 2 life.
• Put target non-Dragon creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose 2 life.

name: Kaito's Pursuit
text: Target player discards two cards. Ninjas and Rogues you control gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor: Kaito knew every rooftop in the city, and closed in quickly on his quarry—but he knew nothing of the Planar Bridge until it was already too late.

rulings.text: The Ninjas and Rogues that gain menace are determined only once, as Kaito's Pursuit resolves. A Ninja or Rogue that enters the battlefield after it resolves will not have menace, and a creature that gained menace this way but then stops being a Ninja or Rogue due to another effect will not lose menace.

foreignNames.name: Kaitos Jagd
foreignNames.text: Ein Spieler deiner Wahl wirft zwei Karten ab. Ninjas und Räuber, die du kontrollierst, erhalten Bedrohlichkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. (Sie können nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito kannte jedes Dach in der Stadt und näherte sich schnell seiner Beute — aber er wusste nichts von der Weltenbrücke, bis es bereits zu spät war.

foreignNames.name: Persecución de Kaito
foreignNames.text: El jugador objetivo descarta dos cartas. Los Ninjas y Bribones que controlas ganan la habilidad de amenaza hasta el final del turno. (No pueden ser bloqueados excepto por dos o más criaturas.)
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito se sabía cada tejado de la ciudad y se acercó rápidamente a su presa, pero no supo nada del puente entre planos hasta que fue demasiado tarde.

foreignNames.name: Poursuite de Kaito
foreignNames.text: Un joueur ciblé se défausse de deux cartes. Les ninjas et les gredins que vous contrôlez acquièrent la menace jusqu'à la fin du tour. (Ils ne peuvent pas être bloqués excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito connaissait le moindre toit de la ville, et il approchait rapidement de sa cible. Malheureusement, il apprit trop tard l'existence du Pont planaire.

foreignNames.name: Inseguimento di Kaito
foreignNames.text: Un giocatore bersaglio scarta due carte. I Ninja e i Farabutti che controlli hanno minacciare fino alla fine del turno. (Non possono essere bloccati tranne che da due o più creature.)
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito conosceva ogni tetto della città e raggiunse presto la sua preda, ma non si accorse del Ponte Planare finché non fu troppo tardi.

foreignNames.name: 魁渡の追跡
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカード２枚を捨てる。ターン終了時まで、あなたがコントロールしているすべての忍者やならず者は威迫を得る。（それらは２体以上のクリーチャーにしかブロックされない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 魁渡は街の屋根をすべて知り尽くしていたため、獲物に素早く迫ることができた。しかし、手遅れになるまで次元橋のことは何も知らなかった。

foreignNames.name: 카이토의 추적
foreignNames.text: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 두 장을 버린다. 당신이 조종하는 닌자 및 도적들은 턴종료까지 호전적을 얻는다. (그 생물들은 두 개 이상의 생물에게만 방어될 수 있다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 카이토는 도시의 모든 지붕을 파악하고 있었기에 사냥감에 빠르게 접근했다—하지만 그는 차원의 다리에 대해서는 전혀 모르고 있었고, 이미 때는 너무 늦어 있었다.

foreignNames.name: Perseguição de Kaito
foreignNames.text: O jogador alvo descarta dois cards. Os Ninjas e os Ladinos que você controla ganham ameaçar até o final do turno. (Eles só podem ser bloqueados por duas ou mais criaturas.)
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito conhecia cada telhado da cidade, e alcançou rapidamente sua presa... mas não sabia da Ponte Planar até ser tarde demais.

foreignNames.name: Погоня Кайто
foreignNames.text: Целевой игрок сбрасывает две карты. Ниндзя и Бродяги под вашим контролем получают Угрозу до конца хода. (Они не могут быть заблокированы менее чем двумя существами.)
foreignNames.flavor: Кайто знал каждую крышу в городе и быстро настиг свою жертву — но о Межмировом Мосте он не знал ничего, а потом стало слишком поздно.

foreignNames.name: 魁渡追逐
foreignNames.text: 目标牌手弃两张牌。由你操控的忍者与浪客获得威慑异能直到回合结束。（它们只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）
foreignNames.flavor: 虽然魁渡熟知城里每一片屋瓦，得以凭地利快速逼近猎物～但他对时空渡桥却一无所知，待他弄清头绪时早已过晚。

foreignNames.name: 魁渡追逐
foreignNames.text: 目標玩家棄兩張牌。由你操控的忍者與浪客獲得威懾異能直到回合結束。（它們只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。）
foreignNames.flavor: 雖然魁渡熟知城裡每一片屋瓦，得以憑地利快速逼近獵物～但他對時空渡橋卻一無所知，待他弄清頭緒時早已過晚。

originalText: Target player discards two cards. Ninjas and Rogues you control gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Kami of Restless Shadows
text:
When Kami of Restless Shadows enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Return up to one target Ninja or Rogue creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

foreignNames.name: Kami der rastlosen Schatten
foreignNames.text:
Wenn der Kami der rastlosen Schatten ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eines —
• Bringe bis zu eine Ninja- oder Räuber-Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.
• Lege eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof oben auf deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Kami de las sombras sin descanso
foreignNames.text:
Cuando el Kami de las sombras sin descanso entre al campo de batalla, elige uno:
• Regresa hasta una carta de criatura objetivo Ninja o Bribón de tu cementerio a tu mano.
• Pon la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio en la parte superior de tu biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Kami des ombres agitées
foreignNames.text:
Quand le Kami des ombres agitées arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez l'un —
• Renvoyez jusqu'à une carte de créature Ninja ou Gredin ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
• Mettez une carte de créature ciblée de votre cimetière au-dessus de votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Kami delle Ombre Inquiete
foreignNames.text:
Quando il Kami delle Ombre Inquiete entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli uno —
• Riprendi in mano fino a una carta creatura Ninja o Farabutto bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.
• Metti una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero in cima al tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 眠らぬ影の神
foreignNames.text:
眠らぬ影の神が戦場に出たとき、以下から１つを選ぶ。
・あなたの墓地にあり忍者やならず者であるクリーチャー・カード最大１枚を対象とする。それをあなたの手札に戻す。
・あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それをあなたのライブラリーの一番上に置く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignNames.name: 쉬지 못하는 그림자의 카미
foreignNames.text:
쉬지 못하는 그림자의 카미가 전장에 들어올 때, 하나를 선택한다 —
• 당신의 무덤에 있는 닌자 또는 도적 생물 카드를 최대 한 장까지 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
• 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 위에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Kami das Sombras Inquietas
foreignNames.text:
Quando Kami das Sombras Inquietas entrar no campo de batalha, escolha um —
• Devolva até um card de criatura Ninja ou Ladino alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.
• Coloque o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério no topo de seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: Ками Беспокойных Теней
foreignNames.text:
Когда Ками Беспокойных Теней выходит на поле битвы, выберите одно —
• Верните не более одной целевой карты существа-Ниндзя или -Бродяги из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.
• Положите целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища на верх вашей библиотеки.

foreignNames.name: 躁影神
foreignNames.text:
当躁影神进战场时，选择一项～
•将至多一张目标忍者或浪客生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。
•将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

foreignNames.name: 躁影神
foreignNames.text:
當躁影神進戰場時，選擇一項～
•將至多一張目標忍者或浪客生物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。
•將目標生物牌從你的墳墓場置於你的牌庫頂。

originalText:
When Kami of Restless Shadows enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Return up to one target Ninja or Rogue creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

name: Kami of Terrible Secrets
text: When Kami of Terrible Secrets enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact and an enchantment, you draw a card and you gain 1 life.
flavor: It feeds on things better left unknown, savoring the bitterness of lies and regrets.

rulings.text: The artifact and the enchantment may be the same permanent.

If you don't control both an artifact and an enchantment at the moment Kami of Terrible Secrets enters the battlefield, its ability won't trigger at all. If the ability triggers, it will check again as it tries to resolve. If you don't control both at that time, the ability won't do anything.
Its terrible secret is that it always forgets to call home on Mother's Day.

foreignNames.name: Kami der schrecklichen Geheimnisse
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Kami der schrecklichen Geheimnisse ins Spiel kommt und falls du ein Artefakt und eine Verzauberung kontrollierst, ziehst du eine Karte und erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
foreignNames.flavor: Er ernährt sich von Dingen, die besser unbekannt bleiben, und genießt die Bitterkeit von Lügen und Reue.

foreignNames.name: Kami de los secretos terribles
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Kami de los secretos terribles entre al campo de batalla, si controlas un artefacto y un encantamiento, robas una carta y ganas 1 vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Se alimenta de lo que es mejor no conocer y saborea la amargura de las mentiras y los remordimientos.

foreignNames.name: Kami des redoutables secrets
foreignNames.text: Quand le Kami des redoutables secrets arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous contrôlez un artefact et un enchantement, vous piochez une carte et vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Il se nourrit de ces choses qu'il vaudrait mieux ne pas connaître, et savoure l'amertume des mensonges et des regrets.

foreignNames.name: Kami dei Terribili Segreti
foreignNames.text: Quando il Kami dei Terribili Segreti entra nel campo di battaglia, se controlli un artefatto e un incantesimo, peschi una carta e guadagni 1 punto vita.
foreignNames.flavor: Si nutre di cose che è meglio non conoscere, gustando l'amarezza delle bugie e dei rimpianti.

foreignNames.name: 恐るべき秘密の神
foreignNames.text: 恐るべき秘密の神が戦場に出たとき、あなたがアーティファクトとエンチャントをコントロールしている場合、あなたはカード１枚を引き、１点のライフを得る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — スピリット
foreignNames.flavor: 知らぬ方がいいものを貪り、嘘と後悔の渋みを味わう。

foreignNames.name: 끔찍한 비밀의 카미
foreignNames.text: 끔찍한 비밀의 카미가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 마법물체 및 부여마법을 조종한다면, 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑고 생명 1점을 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그것은 차라리 모르는 채로 있는 것이 나은 것들을 먹으며, 거짓말과 후회의 씁쓸함을 즐긴다.

foreignNames.name: Kami dos Segredos Terríveis
foreignNames.text: Quando Kami dos Segredos Terríveis entra no campo de batalha, se você controla um artefato e um encantamento, você compra um card e ganha 1 ponto de vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Ele se alimenta de coisas que é melhor desconhecer, saboreando o amargor de mentiras e arrependimentos.

foreignNames.name: Ками Страшных Тайн
foreignNames.text: Когда Ками Страшных Тайн выходит на поле битвы, если вы контролируете артефакт и чары, вы берете карту и получаете 1 жизнь.
foreignNames.flavor: Он питается секретами, которые не стоило раскрывать, смакуя горечь лжи и сожалений.

foreignNames.name: 怖密神
foreignNames.text: 当怖密神进战场时，若你同时操控神器和结界，则你抓一张牌且获得1点生命。
foreignNames.flavor: 它以不应为人所知之事为食，细细品味谎言与悔恨当中的苦涩。

foreignNames.name: 怖密神
foreignNames.text: 當怖密神進戰場時，若你同時操控神器和結界，則你抽一張牌且獲得1點生命。

name: Leech Gauntlet
text:
Lifelink
Equipped creature has lifelink.
Reconfigure {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

rulings.text: Reconfigure represents two activated abilities. Reconfigure [cost] means “[Cost]: Attach this permanent to another target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery,” and “[Cost]: Unattach this permanent. Activate only if this permanent is attached to a creature and only as a sorcery.”
Attaching an Equipment with reconfigure to a creature causes that Equipment to stop being a creature until it becomes unattached. It also loses any creature subtypes it had.

An Equipment doesn't become tapped when the permanent it's attached to becomes tapped. For example, if you attack with a creature that is equipped with Acquisition Octopus, then use reconfigure to unattach Acquisition Octopus after combat, the Octopus will be untapped and could be used to block during your opponent's turn.

Similarly, if an Equipment is tapped, its reconfigure abilities may still be activated and it may still become attached to creatures. Becoming attached doesn't untap it. In most cases, an attached Equipment being tapped won't affect gameplay, but it will be relevant if it becomes unattached again before it untaps.
If an Equipment with reconfigure somehow loses its abilities while it is attached, the effect causing it to not be a creature continues to apply until it becomes unattached.

As soon as an Equipment creature with reconfigure stops being a creature, any Equipment and Auras with enchant creature abilities become unattached. Auras that can enchant an Equipment that isn't a creature remain attached to it.
An Equipment creature with reconfigure can be attached to creatures by effects other than its reconfigure ability, such as the activated ability of Brass Squire.
Although it causes an Equipment to become attached to a creature, reconfigure is not an “equip ability” for the purpose of cards like Fighter Class and Leonin Shikari.
An Equipment creature can never become attached to itself. If an effect tries to do this, nothing happens.

If a permanent with reconfigure is somehow still a creature after it becomes attached (perhaps due to an effect like that of March of the Machines), it immediately becomes unattached from the equipped creature.

name: Lethal Exploit
text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. It gets an additional -1/-1 until end of turn for each modified creature you controlled as you cast this spell. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

rulings.text: An Aura controlled by an opponent does not cause a creature you control to be modified.
A creature with a counter on it is considered modified no matter what kind of counter it is or which player put it on that creature.
A creature that is equipped is considered modified no matter who controls the Equipment that's attached to it.
Only creatures can be modified. If a modified creature stops being a creature, it is no longer considered modified.

name: Life of Toshiro Umezawa // Memory of Toshiro
text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I, II — Choose one —
• Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
• Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
• You gain 2 life.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

rulings.text: Each face of a transforming double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, abilities, and so on. While a transforming double-faced permanent is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored.

Each transforming double-faced card in this set is cast face up. In every zone other than the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face. If it is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's up; the other face's characteristics are ignored.
The mana value of a transforming double-faced card is the mana value of its front face, no matter which face is up.
The back face of a transforming double-faced card usually has a color indicator that defines its color.

A transforming double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed or you cast it transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.

If you are instructed to put a card that isn't a double-faced card onto the battlefield transformed, it will not enter the battlefield at all. In that case, it stays in the zone it was previously in. For example, if a single-faced card is a copy of Azusa's Many Journeys, the chapter III ability will cause it to be exiled and then remain in exile.

name: Malicious Malfunction
text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"That? A minor test, nothing more. Incompleat flesh is weak."
—Jin-Gitaxias

rulings.text: Creatures that would die for any reason this turn are exiled instead, not just creatures that would die after getting -2/-2.

While the -2/-2 applies only to creatures that are on the battlefield as Malicious Malfunction resolves, the replacement effect applies to all creatures that turn, including ones that enter the battlefield after Malicious Malfunction resolves or noncreatures that become creatures after Malicious Malfunction resolves.

이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 당신은 당신의 손에서 원하는 만큼 흑색 카드를 추방할 수 있다. 이 주문은 이렇게 추방된 카드 한 장당 발동하는 데 {2}가 덜 든다.
생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 비참한 슬픔의 행진은 그 목표에게 피해 X점을 입히고 당신은 생명 X점을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Marcha da Tristeza Miserável

Marcha da Tristeza Miserável causa X pontos de dano à criatura ou ao planeswalker alvo e você ganha X pontos de vida.

foreignNames.name: Процессия Отчаянной Печали

Процессия Отчаянной Печали наносит Х повреждений целевому существу или planeswalker'у, а вы получаете Х жизней.

name: Mukotai Ambusher
text:
Ninjutsu {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Lifelink
flavor: The Mukotai Reckoners specialize in stealth and subterfuge.

rulings.text: The ninjutsu ability can be activated only after blockers have been declared. Before then, attacking creatures are neither blocked nor unblocked.

As you activate a ninjutsu ability, you reveal the Ninja card in your hand and return the attacking creature. The Ninja card stays revealed and isn't put onto the battlefield until the ability resolves. If it leaves your hand before then, it won't enter the battlefield at all.

The creature with ninjutsu enters the battlefield attacking the same player or planeswalker that the returned creature was attacking. This is a rule specific to ninjutsu; in other cases, when a creature is put onto the battlefield attacking, that creature's controller chooses which player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Although the Ninja is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

The ninjutsu ability can be activated during the declare blockers step, combat damage step, or end of combat step. In most cases (see below), if you wait until the combatdamage step or end of combat step, it will be after combat damage has been dealt, so the Ninja won't deal combat damage.

If a creature in combat has first strike or double strike, you can activate the ninjutsu ability during the first-strike combat damage step. The Ninja will deal combat damage during the regular combat damage step, even if it has first strike.
Puff of smoke not included.

name: Nashi, Moon Sage's Scion
text:

Whenever Nashi, Moon Sage's Scion deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of each player's library. Until end of turn, you may play one of those cards. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

rulings.text: You may only cast a spell this way by paying the appropriate amount of life. You may not pay its normal cost and may not pay any other alternative costs. You may still pay for additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the spell has mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
You must follow all normal timing rules when casting a spell or playing a land this way. For example, you cannot normally play a land card this way if you have already played a land this turn.
If you cast a spell with {X} in its mana cost this way, the only legal choice for X is 0.
The ninjutsu ability can be activated only after blockers have been declared. Before then, attacking creatures are neither blocked nor unblocked.

As you activate a ninjutsu ability, you reveal the Ninja card in your hand and return the attacking creature. The Ninja card stays revealed and isn't put onto the battlefield until the ability resolves. If it leaves your hand before then, it won't enter the battlefield at all.

The creature with ninjutsu enters the battlefield attacking the same player or planeswalker that the returned creature was attacking. This is a rule specific to ninjutsu; in other cases, when a creature is put onto the battlefield attacking, that creature's controller chooses which player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Although the Ninja is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

The ninjutsu ability can be activated during the declare blockers step, combat damage step, or end of combat step. In most cases (see below), if you wait until the combatdamage step or end of combat step, it will be after combat damage has been dealt, so the Ninja won't deal combat damage.

If a creature in combat has first strike or double strike, you can activate the ninjutsu ability during the first-strike combat damage step. The Ninja will deal combat damage during the regular combat damage step, even if it has first strike.
Puff of smoke not included.

foreignNames.name: 月の賢者の養子、ナシ
foreignNames.text:

月の賢者の養子、ナシがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、各プレイヤーのライブラリーのそれぞれ一番上にあるカード１枚を追放する。ターン終了時まで、あなたはそれらのカードのうち１枚をプレイしてもよい。あなたがこれにより呪文を唱えるなら、マナ・コストを支払うのではなく、それのマナ総量に等しい点数のライフを支払う。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ネズミ・忍者

foreignNames.name: 달빛 현자의 자손, 나시
foreignNames.text:
인술 {3}{B} ({3}{B}, 당신이 조종하는 공격 중인 생물 중 방어 당하지 않은 생물 한 개를 손으로 되돌린다: 당신의 손에서 이 카드를 탭되어 공격 중인 상태로 전장에 놓는다.)
달빛 현자의 자손, 나시가 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 각 플레이어의 서고 맨 위 카드 한 장을 추방한다. 턴종료까지, 당신은 그 카드들 중 한 장을 플레이할 수 있다. 당신이 이런 식으로 주문을 발동한다면, 그 주문의 마나 비용을 지불하는 대신 마나 값만큼 생명점을 지불한다.

foreignNames.name: Nashi, Herdeiro da Sábia da Lua
foreignNames.text:

Se você conjurar uma mágica dessa forma, pague uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual ao valor de mana dela, em vez de pagar seu custo de mana.

foreignNames.name: Наси, Потомок Ведуньи Луны
foreignNames.text:
Ниндзюцу {3}{B} ({3}{B}, верните незаблокированного атакующего под вашим контролем в руку: положите эту карту на поле битвы из вашей руки повернутой и атакующей.)
Каждый раз, когда Наси, Потомок Ведуньи Луны наносит боевые повреждения игроку, изгоните верхнюю карту библиотеки каждого игрока. До конца хода вы можете разыграть одну из тех карт. Если вы разыгрываете таким образом заклинание, то вместо уплаты его мана-стоимости заплатите количество жизней, равное его мановой ценности.

foreignNames.name: 月智者后裔哪失
foreignNames.text:
忍术{3}{B}（{3}{B}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置放进战场，且正进行攻击。）

foreignNames.text:

name: Nezumi Prowler
text:
Ninjutsu {1}{B} ({1}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
When Nezumi Prowler enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn.

rulings.text: The ninjutsu ability can be activated only after blockers have been declared. Before then, attacking creatures are neither blocked nor unblocked.

As you activate a ninjutsu ability, you reveal the Ninja card in your hand and return the attacking creature. The Ninja card stays revealed and isn't put onto the battlefield until the ability resolves. If it leaves your hand before then, it won't enter the battlefield at all.

The creature with ninjutsu enters the battlefield attacking the same player or planeswalker that the returned creature was attacking. This is a rule specific to ninjutsu; in other cases, when a creature is put onto the battlefield attacking, that creature's controller chooses which player or planeswalker it's attacking.
Although the Ninja is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

The ninjutsu ability can be activated during the declare blockers step, combat damage step, or end of combat step. In most cases (see below), if you wait until the combatdamage step or end of combat step, it will be after combat damage has been dealt, so the Ninja won't deal combat damage.

If a creature in combat has first strike or double strike, you can activate the ninjutsu ability during the first-strike combat damage step. The Ninja will deal combat damage during the regular combat damage step, even if it has first strike.
Puff of smoke not included.

name: Okiba Reckoner Raid // Nezumi Road Captain
text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I, II — Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

rulings.text: Each face of a transforming double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, abilities, and so on. While a transforming double-faced permanent is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored.

Each transforming double-faced card in this set is cast face up. In every zone other than the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face. If it is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's up; the other face's characteristics are ignored.
The mana value of a transforming double-faced card is the mana value of its front face, no matter which face is up.
The back face of a transforming double-faced card usually has a color indicator that defines its color.

A transforming double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed or you cast it transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.

If you are instructed to put a card that isn't a double-faced card onto the battlefield transformed, it will not enter the battlefield at all. In that case, it stays in the zone it was previously in. For example, if a single-faced card is a copy of Azusa's Many Journeys, the chapter III ability will cause it to be exiled and then remain in exile.

foreignNames.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは自分の手札を公開する。あなたはその中から土地でないカード１枚を選んでもよい。そうしたなら、そのプレイヤーはそのカードを捨てる。そうしないなら、あなたはあなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーや機体のうち１体の上に＋１/＋１カウンター２個を置く。
foreignNames.flavor:
「あるじゃないか。さて、他には何を持っている？」
――勢団の執行人、拓巳

foreignNames.name: 응징자의 강압적인 수금
foreignNames.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 손을 공개한다. 당신은 그중에서 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 선택할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 그 플레이어는 그 카드를 버린다. 그러지 않으면, 당신이 조종하는 생물 또는 탑승물에 +1/+1 카운터 두 개를 올려놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"그건 시작이야. 다른 건 뭘 가지고 있지?"
—응징자 집행자, 타쿠미

foreignNames.name: Extorsão dos Justiceiros
foreignNames.text: O oponente alvo revela a própria mão. Você pode escolher um card não de terreno da mão dele. Se fizer isso, aquele jogador descarta aquele card. Se não fizer isso, coloque dois marcadores +1/+1 em uma criatura ou um Veículo que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Bom começo. O que mais você trouxe para nós?"
— Takumi, impositor Justiceiro

foreignNames.name: Поборы Карателей
foreignNames.text: Целевой оппонент показывает свою руку. Вы можете выбрать из нее карту, не являющуюся землей. Если вы это делаете, тот игрок сбрасывает ту карту. Если вы этого не делаете, положите два жетона +1/+1 на существо или Машину под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Начало положено. Что еще у тебя есть для нас?»
— Такуми, громила Карателей

foreignNames.name: 帮派诘问
foreignNames.text: 目标对手展示其手牌。你可以选择其中一张非地牌。如果你如此作，则该牌手弃掉该牌。如果你未如此作，则在一个由你操控的生物或载具上放置两个+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「这只是开始。你还有什么没告诉我们的？」
～帮派打手拓巳

foreignNames.name: 幫派詰問
foreignNames.text: 目標對手展示其手牌。你可以選擇其中一張非地牌。如果你如此作，則該玩家棄掉該牌。如果你未如此作，則在一個由你操控的生物或載具上放置兩個+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor:
「這只是開始。你還有什麼沒告訴我們的？」
～幫派打手拓巳

originalText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player discards that card. If you don't, put two +1/+1 counters on a creature or Vehicle you control.

name: Reckoner's Bargain
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed permanent's mana value. Draw two cards.
flavor: Restricted auctions are held once a year at the Dragon's Lair—the sacred, neutral meeting ground of all Reckoner gangs.

foreignNames.name: Pakt des Rabauken
foreignNames.text:
Opfere ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Du erhältst Lebenspunkte in Höhe des Manabetrags der geopferten bleibenden Karte dazu. Ziehe zwei Karten.
foreignNames.flavor: Eingeschränkte Auktionen finden einmal im Jahr im Drachenhort statt — dem heiligen, neutralen Treffpunkt aller Rabauken-Gangs.

foreignNames.name: Trato del criminal
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, sacrifica un artefacto o criatura.
Ganas una cantidad de vidas igual al valor de maná del permanente sacrificado. Roba dos cartas.
foreignNames.flavor: Las subastas restringidas se celebran una vez al año en la Guarida del Dragón, un lugar sagrado y neutral para todas las bandas criminales.

foreignNames.name: Marché de l'héliaste
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, sacrifiez un artefact ou une créature.
Vous gagnez un nombre de points de vie égal à la valeur de mana du permanent sacrifié. Piochez deux cartes.
foreignNames.flavor: Des enchères privées ont lieu une fois par an au Repaire du Dragon—le lieu de rencontre neutre et sacré de tous les gangs d'héliastes.

foreignNames.name: Transazione dell'Ineluttabile
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, sacrifica un artefatto o una creatura.
Guadagni punti vita pari al valore di mana del permanente sacrificato. Pesca due carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Una volta all'anno vengono tenute delle aste private nel Nido del Drago, il sacro luogo d'incontro neutrale per tutte le bande di Ineluttabili.

foreignNames.name: 勢団の取り引き
foreignNames.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、アーティファクトやクリーチャーのうち１つを生け贄に捧げる。
あなたは生け贄に捧げたパーマネントのマナ総量に等しい点数のライフを得る。カード２枚を引く。
foreignNames.flavor: 年に一度、招待制のせり場が竜の巣穴で開催される。それは、すべての勢団にとって神聖かつ中立な場所なのだ。

foreignNames.name: 응징자의 흥정
foreignNames.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 마법물체 또는 생물 한 개를 희생한다.
당신은 희생된 지속물의 마나 값만큼 생명점을 얻는다. 카드 두 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 제한 경매는 1년에 한 번 용의 소굴에서 열리며, 모든 심판자 갱단은 그곳을 신성하고 중립적인 모임 장소로 이용한다.

foreignNames.name: Barganha do Justiceiro
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, sacrifique um artefato ou uma criatura.
Você ganha uma quantidade de pontos de vida igual ao valor de mana da permanente sacrificada. Compre dois cards.
foreignNames.flavor: Os leilões restritos são realizados uma vez por ano no Covil do Dragão, o território neutro sagrado de reunião das gangues de Justiceiros.

foreignNames.name: Сделка Карателя
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания пожертвуйте артефакт или существо.
Вы получаете количество жизней, равное мановой ценности пожертвованного перманента. Возьмите две карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Закрытые аукционы проводятся раз в год в Логове Дракона — священном месте нейтралитета, где встречаются все банды Карателей.

foreignNames.name: 帮派交易
foreignNames.text:
牺牲一个神器或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
你获得若干生命，其数量等同于所牺牲之永久物的法术力值。抓两张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 在育龙巢这块所有黑道帮派都不许妄动的面会中立圣地上，每年都举办一场限要人参加的特殊拍卖。

foreignNames.name: 幫派交易
foreignNames.text:
犧牲一個神器或生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。
你獲得若干生命，其數量等同於所犧牲之永久物的魔法力值。抽兩張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 在育龍巢這片所有黑道幫派都不許妄動的面會中立聖地上，每年都舉辦一場限要人參加的特殊拍賣。

originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
You gain life equal to the sacrificed permanent's mana value. Draw two cards.

name: Return to Action
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."
flavor:
"You're hurt? Too bad. You stop fighting when I say, and not a moment sooner."
—Satoru Umezawa

foreignNames.name: Zurück zur Tat
foreignNames.text: Bis zum Ende des Zuges erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl +1/+0, Lebensverknüpfung und „Wenn diese Kreatur stirbt, bringe sie unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers getappt ins Spiel zurück."
foreignNames.flavor:
„Du bist verletzt? Pech für dich. Du hörst erst auf zu kämpfen, wenn ich es sage, und keinen Moment früher."
—Satoru Umezawa

foreignNames.name: Volver a la acción
foreignNames.text: Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo obtiene +1/+0 y gana la habilidad de vínculo vital y "Cuando esta criatura muera, regrésala al campo de batalla girada bajo el control de su propietario".
foreignNames.flavor:
"¿Te duele? Pues es lo que hay. Dejarás de luchar cuando yo lo diga, no antes".
—Satoru Umezawa

foreignNames.name: Retour à l'action
foreignNames.text: Jusqu'à la fin du tour, une créature ciblée gagne +1/+0 et acquiert le lien de vie et « Quand cette créature meurt, renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille, engagée, sous le contrôle de son propriétaire. »
foreignNames.flavor:
« Tu es blessé ? Dommage. Tu cesseras de te battre quand je te le dirai, et pas avant. »
—Satoru Umezawa

foreignNames.name: Ritorno all'Azione
foreignNames.text: Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio prende +1/+0 e ha legame vitale e "Quando questa creatura muore, rimettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata sotto il controllo del suo proprietario".
foreignNames.flavor:
"Sei ferito? Affari tuoi. Smetterai di combattere quando te lo dico io e non un momento prima."
—Satoru Umezawa

foreignNames.name: 戦闘復帰
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは＋１/＋０の修整を受け絆魂と「このクリーチャーが死亡したとき、これをオーナーのコントロール下でタップ状態で戦場に戻す。」を得る。
foreignNames.flavor:
「負傷しただと？生憎だが、休むのは俺が止めと言ってからだ。つまり、まだだ。」
――梅澤悟

foreignNames.name: 임무 복귀
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 턴종료까지, 그 생물은 +1/+0을 받고 생명연결 및 "이 생물이 죽을 때, 이 생물을 소유자의 조종하에 탭된 채로 전장으로 되돌린다."를 얻는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"다쳤어? 안됐군. 내가 말할 때 싸움을 멈춰야지, 그것보다 한발 먼저 멈추는 게 아니라."
—우메자와 사토루

foreignNames.name: De Volta à Ação
foreignNames.text: Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo recebe +1/+0 e ganha vínculo com a vida e "Quando esta criatura morrer, devolva-a ao campo de batalha virada sob o controle de seu dono".
foreignNames.flavor:
"Você está ferido? Que pena! Você só para de lutar quando eu disser."
— Satoru Umezawa

foreignNames.name: Снова за Дело
foreignNames.text: До конца хода целевое существо получает +1/+0, Цепь жизни и способность «Когда это существо умирает, верните его на поле битвы повернутым под контролем его владельца».
foreignNames.flavor:
«Ты ранен? Очень жаль. Ты прекратишь сражаться, когда я скажу, и ни секундой раньше».
— Сатору Умезава

foreignNames.name: 重回一线
foreignNames.text: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+1/+0且获得系命与「当此生物死去时，将它在其拥有者的操控下横置移回战场。」
foreignNames.flavor:
「你受伤了？可惜啊。你只有在我说停的时候才能停，早一刻都不行。」
～梅泽悟

foreignNames.name: 重回一線
foreignNames.text: 直到回合結束，目標生物得+1/+0且獲得繫命與「當此生物死去時，將它在其擁有者的操控下橫置移回戰場。」
foreignNames.flavor:
「你受傷了？可惜啊。你只有在我說停的時候才能停，早一刻都不行。」
～梅澤悟

originalText: Until end of turn, target creature gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink and "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

name: Soul Transfer
text:
Choose one. If you control an artifact and an enchantment as you cast this spell, you may choose both.
• Exile target creature or planeswalker.
• Return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: The artifact and the enchantment may be the same permanent.
Once you cast Soul Transfer and choose both modes, it doesn't matter what happens to the artifact or enchantment you control in response. Soul Transfer will still have both modes chosen.

foreignNames.name: Seelentransfer
foreignNames.text:
Bestimme eines. Falls du ein Artefakt und eine Verzauberung kontrollierst, sowie du diesen Zauberspruch wirkst, kannst du beides bestimmen.
• Schicke eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl ins Exil.
• Bringe eine Kreaturen- oder Planeswalkerkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück.

foreignNames.name: Transferir alma
foreignNames.text:
Elige uno. Si controlas un artefacto y un encantamiento al lanzar este hechizo, puedes elegir ambos.
• Exilia la criatura o planeswalker objetivo.
• Regresa la carta de criatura o planeswalker objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.

foreignNames.name: Translation d'âme
foreignNames.text:
Choisissez l'un. Si vous contrôlez un artefact et un enchantement au moment où vous lancez ce sort, vous pouvez choisir les deux.
• Exilez une cible, créature ou planeswalker.
• Renvoyez une carte de créature ou de planeswalker ciblée depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.

foreignNames.name: Trasferimento dell'Anima
foreignNames.text:
Scegli uno. Se controlli un artefatto e un incantesimo mentre lanci questa magia, puoi scegliere entrambi.
• Esilia una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio.
• Riprendi in mano una carta creatura o planeswalker bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 魂転移
foreignNames.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。あなたがこの呪文を唱える際にあなたがアーティファクトとエンチャントをコントロールしているなら、あなたは両方を選んでもよい。
・クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１体を対象とする。それを追放する。
あなたの墓地にありクリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーであるカード１枚を対象とする。それをあなたの手札に戻す。

foreignNames.name: 영혼 이동
foreignNames.text:
하나를 선택한다. 당신이 이 주문을 발동하면서 마법물체 및 부여마법을 조종한다면, 당신은 둘 모두를 선택할 수 있다.
• 생물 또는 플레인즈워커를 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 추방한다.
• 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 또는 플레인즈워커 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignNames.name: Transferência de Alma
foreignNames.text:
Escolha um. Se você controlar um artefato e um encantamento conforme você conjurar esta mágica, você poderá escolher ambos.
• Exile a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo.
• Devolva o card de criatura ou planeswalker alvo de seu cemitério para sua mão.

foreignNames.name: Перенос Душ
foreignNames.text:
Выберите одно. Если при разыгрывании этого заклинания вы контролируете артефакт и чары, вы можете выбрать оба.
• Изгоните целевое существо или planeswalker'а.
• Верните целевую карту существа или planeswalker'а из вашего кладбища в вашу руку.

foreignNames.name: 转移灵魂
foreignNames.text:
选择一项。如果你于施放此咒语时同时操控神器和结界，则你可以两项都选。
•放逐目标生物或鹏洛客。
•将目标生物或鹏洛客牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

foreignNames.name: 轉移靈魂
foreignNames.text:
選擇一項。如果你於施放此咒語時同時操控神器和結界，則你可以兩項都選。
•放逐目標生物或鵬洛客。
•將目標生物或鵬洛客牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。

originalText:
Choose one. If you control an artifact and an enchantment as you cast this spell, you may choose both.
• Exile target creature or planeswalker.
• Return target creature or planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Tatsunari, Toad Rider
text:
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, if you don't control a creature named Keimi, create Keimi, a legendary 3/3 black and green Frog creature token with "Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life."
{1}{G/U}: Tatsunari, Toad Rider and target Frog you control can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with flying or reach.

foreignNames.name: Tatsunari der Krötenreiter
foreignNames.text:
Immer wenn du einen Verzauberungszauber wirkst und falls du keine Kreatur namens Keimi kontrollierst, erzeuge Keimi, einen legendären 3/3 schwarzen und grünen Frosch-Kreaturenspielstein mit „Immer wenn du einen Verzauberungszauber wirkst, verliert jeder Gegner 1 Lebenspunkt und du erhältst 1 Lebenspunkt dazu."
{1}{G/U}: Tatsunari der Krötenreiter und ein Frosch deiner Wahl, den du kontrollierst, können in diesem Zug außer von fliegenden Kreaturen und Kreaturen mit Reichweite nicht geblockt werden.

foreignNames.name: Tatsunari, jinete de sapos
foreignNames.text:
Siempre que lances un hechizo de encantamiento, si no controlas una criatura llamada Keimi, crea a Keimi, una ficha de criatura legendaria Rana negra y verde 3/3 con "Siempre que lances un hechizo de encantamiento, cada oponente pierde 1 vida y tú ganas 1 vida".
{1}{G/U}: Tatsunari, jinete de sapos y la Rana objetivo que controlas no pueden ser bloqueados este turno excepto por criaturas con la habilidad de volar o alcance.

foreignNames.name: Tatsunari, chevaucheur de crapaud
foreignNames.text:
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort d'enchantement, si vous ne contrôlez pas une créature appelée Keimi, créez Keimi, un jeton de créature légendaire 3/3 noire et verte Grenouille avec « À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort d'enchantement, chaque adversaire perd 1 point de vie et vous gagnez 1 point de vie. »
{1}{G/U} : Tatsunari, chevaucheur de crapaud et une grenouille ciblée que vous contrôlez ne peuvent pas être bloqués ce tour-ci excepté par les créatures avec le vol ou la portée.

foreignNames.name: Tatsunari, Cavalcarospi
foreignNames.text:
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia incantesimo, se non controlli una creatura chiamata Keimi, crea Keimi, una pedina creatura leggendaria Rana 3/3 nera e verde con "Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia incantesimo, ogni avversario perde 1 punto vita e tu guadagni 1 punto vita".
{1}{G/U}: Tatsunari, Cavalcarospi e una Rana bersaglio che controlli non possono essere bloccati in questo turno tranne che da creature con volare o raggiungere.

foreignNames.name: カエル乗り、達成
foreignNames.text:
あなたがエンチャント・呪文を唱えるたび、あなたが「哇魅」という名前のクリーチャーをコントロールしていない場合、「哇魅」という名前で「あなたがエンチャント・呪文を唱えるたび、各対戦相手はそれぞれ１点のライフを失い、あなたは１点のライフを得る。」を持つ黒緑の３/３の伝説のカエル・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
{1}{G/U}：あなたがコントロールしているカエル１体を対象とする。このターン、それとカエル乗り、達成は飛行も到達も持たないクリーチャーにはブロックされない。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・忍者

foreignNames.name: 두꺼비 기수, 타츠나리
foreignNames.text:
당신이 부여마법 주문을 발동할 때마다, 당신이 케이미라는 이름을 가진 생물을 조종하지 않는다면, 이름이 케이미이며 "당신이 부여마법 주문을 발동할 때마다, 각 상대는 생명 1점을 잃고 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다."를 가진 전설적 3/3 흑색 및 녹색 개구리 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
{1}{G/U}: 당신이 조종하는 개구리를 목표로 정한다. 두꺼비 기수, 타츠나리 및 그 생물은 이 턴에 비행 또는 대공을 가진 생물들에게만 방어될 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Tatsunari, Ginete de Sapo
foreignNames.text:
Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica de encantamento, se você não controlar uma criatura com o nome Keimi, crie Keimi, uma ficha de criatura lendária Sapo preta e verde 3/3 com "Toda vez que você conjura uma mágica de encantamento, cada oponente perde 1 ponto de vida e você ganha 1 ponto de vida".
{1}{G/U}: Tatsunari, Ginete de Sapo, e o Sapo alvo que você controla não podem ser bloqueados neste turno, exceto por criaturas com voar ou alcance.

foreignNames.name: Тацунари, Наездник на Жабе
foreignNames.text:
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание чар, если у вас под контролем нет существа с именем Кэйми, то создайте Кэйми, фишку легендарного существа 3/3 черная и зеленая Лягушка со способностью «Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание чар, каждый оппонент теряет 1 жизнь, а вы получаете 1 жизнь».
{1}{G/U}: Тацунари, Наездник на Жабе и целевая Лягушка под вашим контролем могут быть заблокированы в этом ходу только существами с Полетом или Захватом.

foreignNames.name: 乘蟾达成
foreignNames.text:

{1}{G/U}：乘蟾达成与目标由你操控的蛙本回合只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。

name: Tribute to Horobi // Echo of Death's Wail
text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I, II — Each opponent creates a 1/1 black Rat Rogue creature token.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

rulings.text: Each face of a transforming double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, abilities, and so on. While a transforming double-faced permanent is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored.

Each transforming double-faced card in this set is cast face up. In every zone other than the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face. If it is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's up; the other face's characteristics are ignored.
The mana value of a transforming double-faced card is the mana value of its front face, no matter which face is up.
The back face of a transforming double-faced card usually has a color indicator that defines its color.

A transforming double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed or you cast it transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.

If you are instructed to put a card that isn't a double-faced card onto the battlefield transformed, it will not enter the battlefield at all. In that case, it stays in the zone it was previously in. For example, if a single-faced card is a copy of Azusa's Many Journeys, the chapter III ability will cause it to be exiled and then remain in exile.

originalText:

name: Unforgiving One
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever Unforgiving One attacks, return target creature card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of modified creatures you control. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

rulings.text: The value of X needs to be determined both when the ability triggers (so you can choose a target) and again when the ability resolves (to check if that target is still legal). If the number of modified creatures you control has decreased enough in that time to make the target illegal, Unforgiving One's ability won't resolve.
An Aura controlled by an opponent does not cause a creature you control to be modified.
A creature with a counter on it is considered modified no matter what kind of counter it is or which player put it on that creature.
A creature that is equipped is considered modified no matter who controls the Equipment that's attached to it.
Only creatures can be modified. If a modified creature stops being a creature, it is no longer considered modified.

foreignNames.name: Unbarmherziges Wesen
foreignNames.text:
Bedrohlich (Diese Kreatur kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)
Immer wenn das Unbarmherzige Wesen angreift, bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl mit Manabetrag X oder weniger aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an modifizierten Kreaturen ist, die du kontrollierst. (Auren, die du kontrollierst, Ausrüstungen und Marken sind Modifizierungen.)

foreignNames.name: Ente implacable

foreignNames.name: L'Impitoyable

(Les équipements, les auras que vous contrôlez et les marqueurs sont des modifications.)

foreignNames.name: Colui che Non Perdona

Ogniqualvolta Colui che Non Perdona attacca, rimetti sul campo di battaglia dal tuo cimitero una carta creatura bersaglio con valore di mana pari o inferiore a X, dove X è il numero di creature modificate che controlli. (Equipaggiamenti, Aure che controlli e segnalini sono modifiche.)

foreignNames.name: 慈悲無き者
foreignNames.text:

慈悲無き者が攻撃するたび、あなたの墓地にありマナ総量がＸ以下であるクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とする。それを戦場に戻す。Xはあなたがコントロールしていて改善されているクリーチャーの数に等しい。（装備品やあなたがコントロールしているオーラがついているかカウンターが置かれているクリーチャーは改善されている。）

foreignNames.name: 가차없는 자

가차없는 자가 공격할 때마다, 당신의 무덤에 있는 마나 값이 X 이하인 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다. X는 당신이 조종하는 수정된 생물들의 수이다. (장비, 당신이 조종하는 마법진, 카운터들이 수정 사항이다.)

name: Bronzeplate Boar
text:
Trample
Equipped creature gets +3/+2 and has trample.
Reconfigure {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control; or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached, this isn't a creature.)

rulings.text: Reconfigure represents two activated abilities. Reconfigure [cost] means “[Cost]: Attach this permanent to another target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery,” and “[Cost]: Unattach this permanent. Activate only if this permanent is attached to a creature and only as a sorcery.”
Attaching an Equipment with reconfigure to a creature causes that Equipment to stop being a creature until it becomes unattached. It also loses any creature subtypes it had.

An Equipment doesn't become tapped when the permanent it's attached to becomes tapped. For example, if you attack with a creature that is equipped with Acquisition Octopus, then use reconfigure to unattach Acquisition Octopus after combat, the Octopus will be untapped and could be used to block during your opponent's turn.

Similarly, if an Equipment is tapped, its reconfigure abilities may still be activated and it may still become attached to creatures. Becoming attached doesn't untap it. In most cases, an attached Equipment being tapped won't affect gameplay, but it will be relevant if it becomes unattached again before it untaps.
If an Equipment with reconfigure somehow loses its abilities while it is attached, the effect causing it to not be a creature continues to apply until it becomes unattached.

As soon as an Equipment creature with reconfigure stops being a creature, any Equipment and Auras with enchant creature abilities become unattached. Auras that can enchant an Equipment that isn't a creature remain attached to it.
An Equipment creature with reconfigure can be attached to creatures by effects other than its reconfigure ability, such as the activated ability of Brass Squire.
Although it causes an Equipment to become attached to a creature, reconfigure is not an “equip ability” for the purpose of cards like Fighter Class and Leonin Shikari.
An Equipment creature can never become attached to itself. If an effect tries to do this, nothing happens.

If a permanent with reconfigure is somehow still a creature after it becomes attached (perhaps due to an effect like that of March of the Machines), it immediately becomes unattached from the equipped creature.

Quando il Sintetizzatore Sperimentale entra nel campo di battaglia o lo lascia, esilia la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Fino alla fine del turno, puoi giocare quella carta.
{2}{R}, Sacrifica il Sintetizzatore Sperimentale: Crea una pedina creatura Samurai 2/2 bianca con cautela. Attiva solo come una stregoneria.

foreignNames.name: 実験統合機
foreignNames.text:
実験統合機が戦場に出たか戦場を離れたとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード1枚を追放する。ターン終了時まで、あなたはそのカードをプレイしてもよい。
{2}{R}, 実験統合機を生け贄に捧げる：警戒を持つ白の２/２の侍・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。起動はソーサリーとしてのみ行う。

foreignNames.name: 실험적인 합성기
foreignNames.text:
실험적인 합성기가 전장에 들어오거나 떠날 때, 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드를 추방한다. 턴종료까지, 당신은 그 카드를 플레이할 수 있다.
{2}{R}, 실험적인 합성기를 희생한다: 경계를 가진 2/2 백색 사무라이 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다. 집중마법 시기에만 활성화할 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Sintetizador Experimental
foreignNames.text:
Quando Sintetizador Experimental entrar no ou deixar o campo de batalha, exile o card do topo de seu grimório. Até o final do turno, você poderá jogar aquele card.
{2}{R}, sacrifique Sintetizador Experimental: Crie uma ficha de criatura Samurai branca 2/2 com vigilância. Ative somente como um feitiço.

foreignNames.name: Экспериментальный Синтезатор
foreignNames.text:
Когда Экспериментальный Синтезатор выходит или покидает поле битвы, изгоните верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. До конца хода вы можете разыграть ту карту.
{2}{R}, пожертвуйте Экспериментальный Синтезатор: создайте одну фишку существа 2/2 белый Самурай с Бдительностью. Активируйте только как волшебство.

foreignNames.name: 实验融合仪
foreignNames.text:
当实验融合仪进入或离开战场时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌。
{2}{R}，牺牲实验融合仪：派出一个2/2白色，具警戒异能的武士衍生生物。只能于法术时机起动。

foreignNames.name: 實驗融合儀
foreignNames.text:
當實驗融合儀進入或離開戰場時，放逐你的牌庫頂牌。直到回合結束，你可以使用該牌。
{2}{R}，犧牲實驗融合儀：派出一個2/2白色，具警戒異能的武士衍生生物。只能於巫術時機起動。

originalText:
When Experimental Synthesizer enters or leaves the battlefield, exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Experimental Synthesizer: Create a 2/2 white Samurai creature token with vigilance. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Explosive Entry
text: Destroy up to one target artifact. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
flavor: Kaito and Tamiyo charged headlong into Jin-Gitaxias's secret lab, unaware that the praetor was eagerly awaiting their arrival.

foreignNames.name: Explosiver Auftritt
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre bis zu ein Artefakt deiner Wahl. Lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito und Tamiyo stürmten Hals über Kopf in Jin-Gitaxias Geheimlabor, nicht ahnend, dass der Prätor sie schon sehnsüchtig erwartete.

foreignNames.name: Entrada explosiva
foreignNames.text: Destruye hasta un artefacto objetivo. Pon un contador +1/+1 sobre hasta una criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito y Tamiyo atacaron precipitadamente el laboratorio secreto de Jin-Gitaxias. No sabían que el magistrado esperaba con afán su llegada.

foreignNames.name: Entrée explosive
foreignNames.text: Détruisez jusqu'à un artefact ciblé. Mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur jusqu'à une créature ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito et Tamiyo firent irruption dans le laboratoire secret de Jin-Gitaxias, sans se douter que le praetor attendait leur arrivée avec impatience.

foreignNames.name: Entrata Esplosiva
foreignNames.text: Distruggi fino a un artefatto bersaglio. Scegli fino a una creatura bersaglio. Metti un segnalino +1/+1 su di essa.
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito e Tamiyo irruppero nel laboratorio segreto di Jin-Gitaxias, ignari del fatto che il pretore li stesse aspettando con impazienza.

foreignNames.name: 爆発的登場
foreignNames.text: アーティファクト最大１つとクリーチャー最大1体を対象とする。そのアーティファクトを破壊する。そのクリーチャーの上に＋１/＋１カウンター１個を置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 魁渡とタミヨウはジン＝ギタクシアスの秘密の研究所に一直線に突入した。彼らの到着を待ち構える法務官がそこにいることを知らずに。

foreignNames.name: 폭발적인 등장
foreignNames.text: 마법물체를 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 마법물체를 파괴한다. 생물을 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 카이토와 타미요는 진-기탁시아스의 비밀 연구실을 박차고 들어갔지만, 그 총독이 자신들을 기다리고 있었다는 것은 몰랐다.

foreignNames.name: Entrada Explosiva
foreignNames.text: Destrua até um artefato alvo. Coloque um marcador +1/+1 em até uma criatura alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Kaito e Tamiyo invadiram o laboratório secreto de Jin-Gitaxias sem saber que na verdade o pretor os aguardava ansiosamente.

foreignNames.name: Взрывной Вход
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте не более одного целевого артефакта. Положите один жетон +1/+1 на не более чем одно целевое существо.
foreignNames.flavor: Очертя голову, Кайто и Тамиё ворвались в тайную лабораторию Джин-Джитаксиаса, не зная, что претор с нетерпением ожидал их прибытия.

foreignNames.name: 火爆登场
foreignNames.text: 消灭至多一个目标神器。在至多一个目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 魁渡和多美代一举冲入金吉塔厦的秘密实验室，全然不知这位魔判官已在该处恭候多时。

foreignNames.name: 火爆登場
foreignNames.text: 消滅至多一個目標神器。在至多一個目標生物上放置一個+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 魁渡和多美代一舉衝入金吉塔廈的秘密實驗室，全然不知這位魔判官已在該處恭候多時。

originalText: Destroy up to one target artifact. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

name: Explosive Singularity
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature tapped this way.
Explosive Singularity deals 10 damage to any target.

rulings.text: Explosive Singularity's additional cost can't reduce its cost below {R}{R}. You can tap any number of untapped creatures, however, even if they won't reduce the cost further.

foreignNames.name: Explosive Singularität
foreignNames.text:
Als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken, kannst du eine beliebige Anzahl an ungetappten Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, tappen. Dieser Zauberspruch kostet beim Wirken für jede auf diese Weise getappte Kreatur {1} weniger.
Die Explosive Singularität fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 10 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignNames.name: Singularidad explosiva
foreignNames.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, puedes girar cualquier cantidad de criaturas enderezadas que controlas. Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar este hechizo por cada criatura girada de esta manera.
La Singularidad explosiva hace 10 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.

foreignNames.name: Singularité explosive
foreignNames.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, vous pouvez engager n'importe quel nombre de créatures dégagées que vous contrôlez. Ce sort coûte {1} de moins à lancer pour chaque créature engagée de cette manière.
La Singularité explosive inflige 10 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.

foreignNames.name: Singolarità Esplosiva
foreignNames.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, puoi TAPpare un qualsiasi numero di creature STAPpate che controlli. Questa magia costa {1} in meno per essere lanciata per ogni creatura TAPpata in questo modo.
La Singolarità Esplosiva infligge 10 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.

foreignNames.name: 爆発的特異性
foreignNames.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、あなたがコントロールしている望む数のアンタップ状態のクリーチャーをタップしてもよい。この呪文を唱えるためのコストは、これによりタップしたクリーチャー１体につき{1}少なくなる。
クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーやプレイヤーのうち１つを対象とする。爆発的特異性はそれに10点のダメージを与える。

foreignNames.name: 폭발적인 특이점
foreignNames.text:
이 주문을 발동하기 위한 추가비용으로, 당신은 당신이 조종하는 언탭된 생물을 원하는 만큼 탭할 수 있다. 이 주문은 이렇게 탭된 생물 한 개당 발동하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.
원하는 목표를 정한다. 폭발적인 특이점은 그 목표에게 피해 10점을 입힌다.

foreignNames.name: Singularidade Explosiva
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, você pode virar qualquer número de criaturas desviradas que você controla. Esta mágica custa {1} a menos para ser conjurada para cada criatura virada dessa forma.
Singularidade Explosiva causa 10 pontos de dano a qualquer alvo.

foreignNames.name: Взрывная Сингулярность
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания этого заклинания вы можете повернуть любое количество неповернутых существ под вашим контролем. Разыгрывание этого заклинания стоит на {1} меньше за каждое существо, повернутое таким образом.
Взрывная Сингулярность наносит 10 повреждений любой цели.

foreignNames.name: 火爆奇点
foreignNames.text:
你可以横置任意数量由你操控且未横置的生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。每以此法横置一个生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。
火爆奇点对任意一个目标造成10点伤害。

foreignNames.name: 火爆奇點
foreignNames.text:
你可以橫置任意數量由你操控且未橫置的生物，以作為施放此咒語的額外費用。每以此法橫置一個生物，此咒語便減少{1}來施放。
火爆奇點對任意一個目標造成10點傷害。

originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap any number of untapped creatures you control. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature tapped this way.
Explosive Singularity deals 10 damage to any target.

name: Fable of the Mirror-Breaker // Reflection of Kiki-Jiki
text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
I — Create a 2/2 red Goblin Shaman creature token with "Whenever this creature attacks, create a Treasure token."
II — You may discard up to two cards. If you do, draw that many cards.
III — Exile this Saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

rulings.text: The token created by Reflection of Kiki-Jiki copies exactly what was printed on the original creature (except that the copy also has haste) and nothing else (unless it's copying a creature that's a token or that's copying something else; see below). It doesn't copy whether the creature is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and/or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that changed its power, toughness, types, color, and so on. Most notably, if the target creature isn't normally a creature, the copy won't be a creature.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
If a copied creature is copying something else, the token you create will use the copiable values of the target creature. In most cases, it will just be a copy of whatever that creature is copying.
If a copied creature is a token that isn't a copy of something else, the copy copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created it.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this permanent] enters the battlefield” or “[this permanent] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the copied creature card will also work.

If another creature becomes a copy of, or enters the battlefield as a copy of, the token, that creature will copy the creature card the token is copying, except it will also have haste. However, you won't sacrifice the new copy at the beginning of the next end step.
If Reflection of Kiki-Jiki's ability creates multiple tokens due to a replacement effect (such as the one Doubling Season creates), you'll sacrifice each of them.

Each face of a transforming double-faced card has its own set of characteristics: name, types, subtypes, abilities, and so on. While a transforming double-faced permanent is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's currently up. The other set of characteristics is ignored.

Each transforming double-faced card in this set is cast face up. In every zone other than the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of its front face. If it is on the battlefield, consider only the characteristics of the face that's up; the other face's characteristics are ignored.
The mana value of a transforming double-faced card is the mana value of its front face, no matter which face is up.
The back face of a transforming double-faced card usually has a color indicator that defines its color.

A transforming double-faced card enters the battlefield with its front face up by default, unless a spell or ability instructs you to put it onto the battlefield transformed or you cast it transformed, in which case it enters with its back face up.

If you are instructed to put a card that isn't a double-faced card onto the battlefield transformed, it will not enter the battlefield at all. In that case, it stays in the zone it was previously in. For example, if a single-faced card is a copy of Azusa's Many Journeys, the chapter III ability will cause it to be exiled and then remain in exile.
